nodes.excerpt: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.

localize.description: 收集巨大的内容。Hypto.io将NFT收藏带出了数字艺术领域，让用户从专属的创作者和影响者网络中收集互联网历史上的巨大时刻。
localize.tagline: 通过NFT区块链，拥有互联网历史上的病毒时刻。

localize.tagline: 通過NFT區塊鏈，擁有互聯網歷史上的病毒時刻。

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
nodes.author: Ilia Maksimenka

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi仪表板，它聚合了来自不同区块链的最流行的DeFi协议，允许用户在一个简单的界面上管理他们的DeFi投资组合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask钱包交易和购买任何ERC20代币。
localize.tagline: 最简单的投资DeFi和管理加密投资组合的方法。

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi儀表板，它聚合了來自不同區塊鏈的最流行的DeFi協議，允許用戶在一個簡單的界面上管理他們的DeFi投資組合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask錢包交易和購買任何ERC20代幣。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的投資DeFi和管理加密投資組合的方法。

nodes.excerpt: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-material-ui?ref=producthunt is a free and open-source admin template for React & Material-UI that will help you create amazing websites. ✔️ 100 Handcrafted Elements ✔️ 4 Customized Plugins ✔️ 6 Example Pages Kick-start building your web apps now!

nodes.excerpt: https://pry.co helps founders and makers manage their finances. Instead of using Excel, Founders and business owners can use Pry to manage their budget, expenses, hiring plan, and cash runway.

nodes.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
nodes.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion
nodes.author: Isabel Nyo

localize.description: 无论你是制造者、内容创作者、自由职业者、独立黑客、影响者还是思想领袖，《创客系统》都将帮助你保持组织性和正轨性。你不再需要仅仅依靠你的动机或灵感来完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有条不紊，保持生产力，并在Notion中产生成果。

localize.description: 無論你是製造者、內容創作者、自由職業者、獨立黑客、影響者還是思想領袖，《創客系統》都將幫助你保持組織性和正軌性。你不再需要僅僅依靠你的動機或靈感來完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有條不紊，保持生產力，並在Notion中產生成果。

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.
nodes.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
nodes.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

localize.description: 网络分析变得简单，因此对隐私友好。没有Cookies。没有记录。没有IP地址指纹。我们不收集个人数据，这允许以较少的托管成本为许多用户服务。源代码是在AGPL-v3许可下发布的。
localize.tagline: 简单而免费的网络分析

localize.description: 網絡分析變得簡單，因此對隱私友好。沒有Cookies。沒有記錄。沒有IP地址指紋。我們不收集個人數據，這允許以較少的託管成本爲許多用戶服務。源代碼是在AGPL-v3許可下發布的。
localize.tagline: 簡單而免費的網絡分析

nodes.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
nodes.title: appfleet - Edge compute for containerized services & deploy global apps
nodes.author: Dmitriy A.

localize.description: appfleet是一个边缘计算平台，允许人们在全球范围内部署他们的网络应用。您现在可以在任何地方同时运行您的代码，而不是在单一的集中位置运行。获得更好的性能、延迟和正常运行时间!
localize.tagline: 用于容器化服务和部署全局应用的边缘计算。

localize.description: appfleet是一個邊緣計算平臺，允許人們在全球範圍內部署他們的網絡應用。您現在可以在任何地方同時運行您的代碼，而不是在單一的集中位置運行。獲得更好的性能、延遲和正常運行時間!
localize.tagline: 用於容器化服務和部署全局應用的邊緣計算。

nodes.excerpt: Supersourcing helps both startups & enterprises find the right tech partners faster than ever before. The decade-old process of outsourcing is boring, expensive and often risky. Supersourcing is 100% pure delight. Trusted by founders from YC, Harvard & MIT.
nodes.title: Supersourcing - Discover & hire the right tech partner for your business
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 超级外包帮助初创公司和企业比以往任何时候都更快地找到合适的技术合作伙伴。十年前的外包过程是枯燥的、昂贵的，而且往往是有风险的。而Supersourcing则是100%的纯粹乐趣。受到来自YC、哈佛和MIT的创始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 为您的企业发现和雇佣合适的技术合作伙伴。

localize.description: 超級外包幫助初創公司和企業比以往任何時候都更快地找到合適的技術合作夥伴。十年前的外包過程是枯燥的、昂貴的，而且往往是有風險的。而Supersourcing則是100%的純粹樂趣。受到來自YC、哈佛和MIT的創始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 爲您的企業發現和僱傭合適的技術合作夥伴。

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
nodes.author: Vlad  Grossman

localize.description: 一个全面的工具，确保申请人跟踪系统(ATS)和其他自动过滤系统能够准确地阅读你的简历并从中提取文本。只有当机器能够正确阅读您的简历时，您的简历才会提交给人工审核员。
localize.tagline: 测试机器是否能解析你的简历并读取其内容。

localize.description: 一個全面的工具，確保申請人跟蹤系統(ATS)和其他自動過濾系統能夠準確地閱讀你的簡歷並從中提取文本。只有當機器能夠正確閱讀您的簡歷時，您的簡歷纔會提交給人工審覈員。
localize.tagline: 測試機器是否能解析你的簡歷並讀取其內容。
